name: Wunderkarte
tagline: A beautiful stretching vintage LaTeX template
body: # Wunderkarte A beautiful vintage LaTeX template. ## What? This is great for posters, invitations or even business cards. ## Usage To stretch text to full-width of the page, use the shortcut ``` latex \wunder{Here comes the text} ``` In order to reduce the vertical space _after_ a line, use the shortcut ``` latex \vsp{-.2} ``` Place it _before_ the line that you want it to have reduced vertical space!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
